entities.name: nagini
entities.description: Nagini is mentioned as having interesting news, indicating she has some information to share.

entities.name: wormtail
entities.description: Wormtail is addressed by the voice and responds to it, showing he is present in the conversation.

entities.name: frank
entities.description: Frank is mentioned as an old Muggle standing outside the room, listening to every word they say.

entities.name: muggle
entities.description: Muggle refers to a group of people who are not part of the magical community.

relationships.description: Nagini has interesting news, which she shares with Wormtail.
The voice communicates with Wormtail and addresses him directly.
Frank is standing outside the room, listening to every word they say.
Wormtail is asked by the voice to invite Frank inside.
